summary: Another mod request with the heartstone in staff of magnus
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00]Note:Â 
[/color]This was done for a request. At the moment the staff has the same spell properties as the staff of magnus. It can be found beside warmaidens in Whiterun

[color=#00ff00]Mod includes:[/color]
Heart stone Staff

Usable by player

[color=#00ff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim
Dragonborn

[b][color=#00ff00]Installation/Uninstallation:[/color]
[/b]Nexus Mod Manager
Manual install: Exract contents to data file
Manual uninstall: Delete bsa and esp

[color=#00ff00]Bugs/Incompatibilities:[/color]
There shouldn't be any. Please let me know if there are any problems

[color=#00ff00]Legal:[/color]
This is a nexus only mod, I have not given permission for it or any part of it to be uploaded anywhere else. You must ask permission to re-package or distribute any part of this mod.
author: gob_secret_lover
